page.title: 17BROWNIES AND GUIDES
page.content: One hobby in our area is Brownies and Girl Guides. You start Brownies at the age of 7 and leave to go to Guides at 10. The leader of the Brownies is called Brown Owl and the helpers are named after animals. When you have just joined Brownies you are known as "Tweenies" until you are enrolled by giving this promise:{I promise that I {will do my best, To do my duty to God, {To serve the Queen and help other {people and to keep the (Brownie) Guide {law.}You leave Guides at 15 and then you can go to Young Leaders or Rangers. Our leader at Guides is known as Captain. As a Guide you can go camping, go on cook-outs and hikes. A cook-out is when you are outside and you cook on an open fire, and of course you can do interest badges at Brownies and Guides. {by Clare Woodcock
